verbs.description: I [V: do] n't have a hot second for those who still think President Trump was a good idea .
[ARG0: I] do [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: have] [ARG1: a hot second] [ARGM-PNC: for those who still think President Trump was a good idea] .
I do n't have a hot second for [ARG0: those] [R-ARG0: who] [ARGM-TMP: still] [V: think] [ARG1: President Trump was a good idea] .
I do n't have a hot second for those who still think [ARG1: President Trump] [V: was] [ARG2: a good idea] .
